entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hearst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:54 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
